text: Kelsea Ballerini released her latest single, ` ` Legends,'' in June, and the accompanying music video dropped soon after to give fans a taste of what they could expect from the country star's sophomore album. The sweeping song details an epic love story that came to an end, and while listeners may have had one image in their minds while listening, the song's video told a surprising and heart - wrenching story that definitely delivered on the emotion. Up Next : Kelsea Ballerini Is Taking a Page out of Carrie Underwood's Wedding Playbook For Ballerini's portion of the video, shot in Carmel, California, she sings atop beautiful scenery wearing a flowing gown.
